title: Secret stash mastery with refillable potion and corrupting potion
body: Does secret stash work with refillable potion and corrupting potion?

replies.body:
Not the transform into biscuit part. Not sure about the length increase though; wiki makes it seem like it doesn't.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/LQMEq2mt-question-about-mastery-secret-stash

People here said maybe it does. It's only like a 10% difference though so it's hard to tell.
